data.title: Moksha Himalaya Spa Resort
data.meta_description: Ayurvedic massage at Moksha Himalayan Spa Resort will replenish not just your body but also mind and soul. It is a good place for adventure lovers.
data.text:
Itinerary:

Day 1 – Delhi:

Upon arrival at Delhi airport welcome meet and assist by our representative and transfer to hotel 1400 Hrs: Standard check in time

Rest of the day at leisure and Overnight stay at hotel

Day 2 – Delhi to Kalka:

Delhi to Kalka by train Shatabadi express:0740-1145 hrs

Kalka to Parwanoo by surface

Transfer from hotel to Delhi railway station in time to board train for Kalka. Local snacks, tea or coffee and Breakfast will be served on board

1145 hrs: Arrive Kalka

Upon arrival at Kalka railway station you will travel by road to Parwanoo

Upon arrival at Parwanoo transfer by cable car from the base of the mountain to the top and check in at Moksha Himalaya Spa resort – Experience. Set amongst the scenic wonder of the Himalayan Mountains, Moksha Himalaya Spa Resort, comprises 15 colonial inspired buildings, all within a few minutes convenient walk of all guest areas. Just 62 Moksha Suites are available either as a stay with breakfast & dinner or with our more comprehensive The Moksha Experience packages. Regarding every stay is designed to perfectly deliver to individual travelers, romantic hideaways, honeymoon couples, and natural destination spa lovers for a unique suite experience amongst the Himalayan Mountains For accommodation, all Moksha guest suites are tastefully furnished in natural wood and stone finishes. The spacious Moksha suites comprises 75 square meters complete with separate furnished living room, private terrace, luxurious ove rsized private dressing and bathroom with extra-deep bathtub and heavenly rain shower, and a master bedroom with a king size bed, individually controlled air-conditioning, 2 LCD televisions with international satellite TV channels/programmes, radio and in-house music, DVD Player (on request), in-room safe, fully-supplied mini-bar and refrigerator, smoke detector, IDD line telephone (via switchboard), high-speed Internet access, hairdryer, and tea & coffee making facilities. Each Moksha Suite has stunning valley and panoramic mountain views from living areas and bathroom add to the total enjoyment Overnight stay at hotel.

Day 3-5 Moksha Himalaya Spa Resort:

Therapies/Rituals

Ayurvedic and Wellness Consultation

Restorative Foot Therapy

Shirobhyanga Indian Head & Shoulder Massage

Grounding Aromatherapy Massage using Aphrodisiac Quality Blended Essential Oils of Rose, Sandalwood and Vetiver known as India’s Oil of Tranquility

Personalized Yoga Session per room (Daily AM/PM )

Personalized Meditation Session per room (Daily AM/PM)

Day 6 – Parwanoo to Kalka by surface:

Kalka to Delhi by Shatabadi express:1745-2155 hrs

Breakfast at hotel

1200 Noon standard check out time

You will be transferred by cable car from resort to base of the mountain and travel by road to Kalka

1745 hrs: Depart by Shatabadi express Local snacks, tea or coffee and Dinner will be served on board

2155 hrs: Arrive Delhi

Upon arrival Delhi railway station transfer to your hotel

Overnight stay at hotel

Day 7 – Depart Delhi:
